definitions.definition: A thing that is of smaller size, value, importance etc.
definitions.example: The greater sand hills increasingly do not migrate, but almost all lessers do.

definitions.definition: Of two (or, rarely, more than two) things: the smaller in size (littler), in value, in importance etc.

definitions.example: Did he tell you any embarrassing stories about when she was little?

definitions.definition: (also Little) Used with the name of a place, especially of a country or its capital, to denote a neighborhood whose residents or storekeepers are from that place.
Small in amount or number, having few members.

definitions.example: I feel better after my little sleep.

definitions.definition: Small in extent of views or sympathies; narrow; shallow; contracted; mean; illiberal; ungenerous.
